full_summary:
## Tender Announcement
### Title
Echosounder and Related Equipment

### Status
Expired

### Reference Number
WS4394848742

### Solicitation Number
WS4394848742

### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
#### Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5 Canada

#### Name of End-User Entity
Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
#### Address
200 Kent Street
Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6

### Objectives
Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, has a requirement for an Echosounder and related equipment.

### Technical Specifications
* Procurement Category: General Government (GD)
* UNSPSC Code(s): 21110000 (Fishing and aquaculture equipment), 41110000 (Measuring and observing and testing instruments )
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Administrative Details
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Tender Closing Date: February 26, 2024, 14:00:00 Eastern Standard Time

### Contacts
Contact Name: Dave Dunne, SPAC/TPSC
Contact Email: [dave.dunne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dave.dunne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Access the Notice

To access the complete notice, please click on [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18669371?extsite=MTg2NjkzNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18669371?extsite=MTg2NjkzNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

 Please note the contacts, bidding schedule, and technical details mentioned in the rewritten tender announcement above. Ensure you reach out or access the notice with the contact provided. Don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions or need further support.  You should also ensure to check the official tender announcement on the linked website above before making any further inquiries.   Remember that certain areas like timeline, have changed to provide more clarity to interested parties.
